alert.note: Alert for Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 9:29AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Winneshiek County through 1000 AM CDT... At 928 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Decorah, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Winneshiek County, including the following locations... Festina, Hesper, Nordness, Highlandville, Lake Meyer County Park, Glenwood Church, County Road W 46 And Centennial Road, Locust, Sattre and State Road 9 And 245th Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
